New Records: Pakistan achieved the biggest World Cup chase in history
Pre-Game Insights: The team felt good about their chances of hunting down the sizeable target at the midway point of the innings
Post-Match Reflections: Rizwan revealed that the team decided to go with a deep partnership after Babar Azam was dismissed
Rizwan joked about his dramatic reaction to cramping
Rizwan gave credit to the physio for helping him with cramp
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan will hope that Rizwan stays fit and healthy to help steer the team to the final four of the tournament
Two wins from two has put Pakistan in a strong early position, second in the table behind New Zealand on net run rate
